__e: I really don't have the energy for more than one woman at the same time, you know.
Can l--? . Can I go be with her now?
Sweetheart, please, you need to use all of your energy just to get better, not to worry about Clark.
I haven't had any energy, and every part of my body just hurts.

Everybody who's here, I'd like to ask you... to try to stop thinking about your jobs, your marriage, your schoolwork... what you have to do tomorrow, what you forgot today... and let us focus all of our energies... and all of our love... on these two men here:
So they asked me if I would talk, and I said yes, and I summoned all my energy, and I did two shows.
